feed.title: Open Source Fashion
feed.subtitle: Collection of open fashion patterns and resources.

entry.title: Hello, world!
entry.content:
I started this as a place to collect, publish and share open fashion resources I have created and collected through the years.

More soon,

xx Cecilia

Check out the Open Fashion repo on GitHub.
entry.summary: I started this as a place to collect, publish and share open fashion resources I have created and collected through the years.
